levels.description:
Deal <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage, and an additional <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> ATK as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</> if the enemy is not under the burst effect
<@ba.rem>Can store 1 charge and cannot use normal attacks when skill is inactive</>
